name: Les Légions Noires
description: '''Les Légions Noires''' (also known as '''The Black Legions''' in English, or simply abbreviated to '''LLN''') was a movement of French underground [[black metal]] musicians and their bands, centered mostly around the city of [[Brest, France|Brest]], in [[Brittany]]. The bands involved limited their releases to very small numbers (often just enough to get to the other circle members), and distributed them among friends and close workers.
